Address.label: Address
Address.value: 9 PAR-LA-VILLE ROAD,2ND FLOOR, S.E. PEARMAN BUILDING, HAMILTON, HM 11, Bermuda

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Golar LNG Ltd is a midstream LNG company operates in the transportation, regasification, liquefaction, and trading of LNG. The segment in which the group operates includes Shipping, FLNG (Floating Liquefaction Natural Gas vessels), Power, and Corporate and other. It generates maximum revenue from the FLNG segment.
